# IntPtrExtensions.ToByteArray method

Converts specified IntPtr to byte array reference.

```csharp
public static byte[] ToByteArray(this IntPtr source, int startIndex, int length)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| source | Target pointer |
| startIndex | Index |
| length | Lenght |

## Return Value

A byte array reference.
